description: '''Gabberpop''', also known as '''gabber-pop''' or '''pop-gabber''', is a [[music genre|musical genre]] that combines elements of pop music with [[gabber]]-related genres such as [[happy hardcore]]. The genre is characterized by the predominant mix of powerful [[Bass drum|kicks]] and pop or [[Rapping|rap]] vocals. Its tempo typically ranges between 150 and 180 BPM.
